name: 数据集整体概况与描述统计
description: Comprehensive dataset overview including variable structure, descriptive statistics, missing value patterns, and primary key uniqueness check

name: 分组描述统计
description: Grouped descriptive statistics by specified grouping variable, including sample size, mean, standard deviation, percentiles for each group, with preliminary group comparison

name: 数据筛选与抽样
description: Filter samples based on conditions and optionally perform random sampling, outputting cleaned dataset

name: 数据集合并（横向）
description: Merge two datasets horizontally using key variables, supporting 1:1, m:1, 1:m merge types with detailed diagnostics

name: 数据集追加（纵向合并）
description: Vertically append multiple datasets, check variable consistency, generate source markers, handle variable structure differences

name: 数据表形态转换（宽表/长表）
description: Convert between wide and long format for panel data, with pre and post conversion diagnostics

name: 数值变量描述统计（论文表1）
description: Complete descriptive statistics for numeric variables in academic paper Table 1 format, including N, Mean, SD, Min, percentiles, Max, skewness, kurtosis

name: 分类变量频数分布表
description: Output frequency distributions for categorical variables including counts, percentages, and cumulative percentages with bar charts

name: 相关系数矩阵（Pearson与Spearman）
description: Calculate Pearson and Spearman correlation matrices with significance tests, identify highly correlated variable pairs for multicollinearity detection

name: 变量分布可视化（直方图/箱线图/核密度/QQ图）
description: Generate multiple distribution plots for numeric variables including histogram, kernel density, box plot, and QQ plot with normality tests

name: 散点图矩阵与变量关系可视化
description: Generate pairwise scatter plot matrix with linear fit and correlation annotations, supporting grouped comparisons

name: 单样本t检验
description: Test whether a variable's mean equals a specified theoretical or benchmark value, including effect size calculation, confidence intervals, and normality tests

name: 独立样本t检验（两组均值比较）
description: Compare means of two independent groups with variance homogeneity test, Welch t-test, effect size calculation, and visualization

name: 配对样本t检验
description: Test paired sample mean differences (before-after measurements, matched samples) with difference distribution tests, effect size calculation, and visualization

name: 单因素方差分析
description: Compare means of three or more groups with variance homogeneity test, post-hoc multiple comparisons, effect size calculation, and visualization

name: 卡方独立性检验
description: Test independence between two categorical variables with expected frequency checks, association strength metrics, and visualization

name: 简单线性回归（一元OLS）
description: Estimate linear relationship between single independent variable and dependent variable, including regression diagnostics, heteroscedasticity tests, normality tests and visualization

name: 多元线性回归
description: Estimate linear relationships between multiple independent variables and a dependent variable with VIF multicollinearity test, heteroscedasticity test, and RESET specification test

name: 稳健标准误OLS回归
description: OLS regression with heteroscedasticity-robust standard errors (Huber-White), comparing OLS vs robust SE with diagnostic tests

name: 聚类稳健标准误OLS回归
description: OLS regression with cluster-robust standard errors for handling within-group correlation, comparing OLS, robust, and cluster SE

name: 含交互项的回归
description: Estimate regression models with interaction terms for moderation analysis, including marginal effects analysis and visualization

name: 实体固定效应
description: Entity fixed effects regression using areg to control for time-invariant individual characteristics with clustered standard errors

name: 时间固定效应
description: Add time dummy variables to control for time effects and eliminate common time trends

name: 多模型对比
description: Compare multiple regression models with key metrics, perform nested tests, and help select optimal model specification

name: 二元Logit模型
description: Estimate binary logistic regression with coefficients, odds ratios, marginal effects, goodness of fit, and ROC analysis

name: 二元Probit模型
description: Estimate binary probit regression with marginal effects, goodness of fit, ROC analysis, and Logit comparison

name: 有序Logit模型
description: Estimate ordered logistic regression with odds ratios, marginal effects, and proportional odds assumption test

name: 多项Logit模型
description: Estimate multinomial logistic regression for unordered categorical outcomes with relative risk ratios and marginal effects

name: 计数模型
description: Estimate Poisson and negative binomial regression for count data with overdispersion tests and model comparison

name: 面板数据设置与检查
description: Set up panel data structure with xtset, check balance, missing values, and provide within-between variance decomposition

name: 面板固定效应回归
description: Estimate panel fixed effects regression to control for unobserved individual heterogeneity with clustered standard errors

name: 面板随机效应回归
description: Estimate panel random effects regression with GLS, BP-LM test for individual effects, and robust standard errors

name: FE/RE比较与Hausman检验
description: Compare fixed effects and random effects models with Hausman specification test to select appropriate model

name: 经典2×2双重差分
description: Estimate classic 2x2 difference-in-differences model for policy evaluation with trend visualization

name: 事件研究法DID
description: Estimate event study DID model with dynamic treatment effects and parallel trends test

name: 时间序列诊断图
description: Generate time series plot, ACF and PACF for pattern identification and ARIMA order selection

name: 单位根检验
description: Perform ADF and Phillips-Perron unit root tests to determine stationarity and integration order

name: ARIMA模型估计
description: Estimate ARIMA(p,d,q) model with residual diagnostics and model fit statistics

name: 时间序列预测
description: Generate multi-period forecasts based on ARIMA model with point estimates and confidence intervals

name: 双变量VAR模型
description: Estimate bivariate VAR model with Granger causality tests, impulse response analysis and variance decomposition

name: Kaplan-Meier生存曲线
description: Plot Kaplan-Meier survival curves, estimate survival functions, and calculate median survival time

name: Log-rank检验
description: Perform Log-rank test and other non-parametric tests for survival curve comparison

name: Cox比例风险回归
description: Estimate Cox proportional hazards regression model with proportional hazards assumption test

name: 时变协变量Cox模型
description: Estimate Cox model with time-varying covariates using counting process data format

name: 主成分分析
description: Perform PCA, output eigenvalues, loadings and component scores

name: 因子分析
description: Perform exploratory factor analysis, extract latent factors and rotate

name: K-means聚类
description: Perform K-means clustering, output cluster labels and characteristics

name: 层次聚类
description: Perform hierarchical clustering, generate dendrogram and cluster labels

name: 自动化分析报告
description: Automatically perform descriptive statistics, regression analysis and generate comprehensive report

name: 输出文件打包
description: Bundle output files into outputs subdirectory with manifest

name: 缩尾处理
description: Winsorize numeric variables to replace extreme values with specified percentile values

name: 标准化与归一化
description: Standardize (Z-score) or normalize (Min-Max) numeric variables

name: 缺失值多重插补
description: Multiple imputation for missing data using chained equations (MICE)

name: 异常值检测与处理
description: Detect outliers using IQR, Z-score or MAD methods, with flag/drop/replace options

name: 变量生成器
description: Generate lag, difference, and growth rate variables for panel data

name: 面板数据平衡化
description: Convert unbalanced panel to balanced panel by filling or dropping

name: 字符串变量处理
description: Clean and transform string variables with trim, case conversion, regex operations

name: 日期时间变量处理
description: Parse and transform date/time variables, extract components, calculate differences

name: 分组变量生成
description: Generate group variables based on quantiles, equal intervals, or custom cutpoints

name: 虚拟变量批量生成
description: Generate dummy variables for categorical variables with base group selection

name: 数据去重与唯一性检查
description: Check for duplicates and perform deduplication based on key variables

name: 变量标签批量管理
description: Batch manage variable labels and value labels with import/export/clean/auto

name: 数据集抽样
description: Perform stratified random sampling with proportional/equal/fixed methods

name: 数据质量诊断报告
description: Comprehensive data quality assessment with missing values, outliers, and consistency checks

name: 分组描述统计
description: Generate grouped descriptive statistics table in paper Table 1 format

name: 正态性检验
description: Calculate skewness/kurtosis and perform Shapiro-Wilk normality tests
